description:
Are you just getting started with real estate investing, and you'd like to learn how to identify, buy and manage rental houses? Or are you a frustrated landlord that wants to learn a better way to manage your houses and find more of them? Then this course is for you.

I start from scratch and teach you everything about the rental house process from getting your business set up while you're getting started all the way though managing your rental houses so they don't take over your life.

No prior knowledge of real estate or rental houses is required.
title: How to Buy Your First Rental House
